>From: Catbik Tinkerton <catbik@...>

>>Gnomish cloak = small tattered cape. No patterns exist for cloaks
>>(translation: tailors can't make them) but the 'rare' patchwork pieces are
>>sometimes given as rewards for low level warrior quests. I have yet to
>>come across a SMALL size tattered cape, though.
>>
>>-Luke
>
>Nice to meet ya Luke, the fella who put together the guide I use for
>tinkering =)
>
>Another question: What low level warrior quests?
>I even tried a small CLOTH cape, but that didn't work. Just so you know.
>
>-Catbik
